name: DUBAI – ALL STUNNING PLACES
description: Located in the eastern part of the Arabian Peninsula on the coast of the Persian Gulf, Dubai aims to be the business hub of Western Asia.

name: FINLAND – HELSINKI, SANTA CLAUS TOWN
description: Its capital, Helsinki, occupies a peninsula and surrounding islands in the Baltic Sea.

name: ENQUIRY FORM ONLY – ITALY
description: Italy, a European country with a long Mediterranean coastline, has left a powerful mark on Western culture and cuisine.

name: JAPAN – 5 DAYS IN TOKYO, FUJIKAWA
description: Japan (Japanese: 日本, Nippon or Nihon, and formally 日本国) is an island country in East Asia, located in the northwest Pacific Ocean.

name: PARIS – EIFFEL TOWER, NOTRE DAME CATH..
description: Paris is located in northern central France, in a north-bending arc of the river Seine whose crest includes two islands.

name: SWITZERLAND – 7 DAYS IN ZURICH, ZERMATT
description: Switzerland, officially the Swiss Confederation, is a landlocked country at the confluence of Western, Central and Southern Europe. ... It is a federal republic ...

name: AMERICA – 2 DAYS IN LAKE TAHOE
description: The United States (U.S. or US), officially the United States of America (U.S.A. or USA) or America, is a country primarily located in North America.
